tool_description: This API generates any kind of room as an array by using your array of objects with your options.
name: Create Game Rooms
title: Create Game Rooms

api_list.name: Get Rooms as Response
api_list.description: You can get the arranged array by sending 'POST' request to '/getRooms' end point.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://create-game-rooms.p.rapidapi.com/getRooms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "create-game-rooms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://create-game-rooms.p.rapidapi.com/getRooms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "create-game-rooms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
